subject: Baseball
Olympic Games (2008)
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Jayson Nix, who hit the batting-practice fly that Mariano Rivera was hurt chasing, was himself the victim of a freak injury while bunting at the Beijing Olympics.
snippet: Jayson Nix, who hit the batting-practice fly that Mariano Rivera was hurt chasing, was himself the victim of a freak injury while bunting at the Beijing Olympics.
